title: fix: enable image-to-video support for grok-video model
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Grok gets vision
gist.blurb: The `grok-video` model can now see! We've enabled image-to-video support, so you can turn your static masterpieces into moving magic.
gist.summary: Enabled image-to-video functionality for the `grok-video` model by updating the API to accept and process input images.
gist.impact: Users can now upload images as prompts for `grok-video` to generate animations, expanding creative possibilities beyond text-only prompts.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a movie director, holding a static picture frame that is magically turning into a flowing film reel. Represents the transition from static image to video using the Grok model.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a magical picture frame where a static flower image is transforming into a flowing film reel. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'GROK VIDEO'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
